title: Experiential STEM-Integrated Language Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience in solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: Practice-centered educational environment integrating STEM concepts into language activities to strengthen vocational foundational competencies.

learning_goals: In real-world tourism scenario-based problem-solving, communication strategies utilizing STEM knowledge are applied with over 80% accuracy.
Creative report-writing skills are achieved through three or more iterations by combining data collected from experiential learning activities with linguistic expressions.
In peer-collaborated problem-solving projects, presentation materials integrating STEM concepts and language skills are produced and delivered by pairs.

resources: STEM Experience Kit (e.g., Simple Circuit Assembly Set)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
